xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Workspace Manager translation page workspacemanager.pluginnotenabled=The Workspace Manager java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the file 'wiki30-components-workspace-manager-.jar' is present under the 'webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib/' folder. # LABELS workspacemanager.createworkspace=Create a new workspace workspacemanager.title.createwiki.wikiname=Workspace identifier workspacemanager.title.createwiki.desc=Workspace description workspacemanager.title.createwiki.members=Initial workspace members workspacemanager.title.join=Join Workspace "{0}" workspacemanager.title.join.empty=Join Workspace workspacemanager.title.leave=Leave Workspace "{0}" workspacemanager.title.leave.empty=Leave Workspace workspacemanager.browse=Browse Workspaces workspacemanager.browse.emptyvalue=N/A workspacemanager.browse.wikiprettyname=Name workspacemanager.browse.description=Description workspacemanager.browse.owner=Owner workspacemanager.browse._actions=Actions workspacemanager.browse._actions.join=Join workspacemanager.browse._actions.leave=Leave # MESSAGES workspacemanager.wikiname.error.wikialreadyexists=A workspace with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.info.valid=You can use this name as new workspace identifier workspacemanager.successcreatewiki=Your workspace \"{0}\" has been created. You can access it at the following address: {1} workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki=Workspace \"{0}\" creation failed: {1}. workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki.ERROR_WM_WIKIALREADYEXISTS=This workspace \"{0}\" already exist. Please choose another name. workspacemanager.install.translations=The translations page has been automatically registered in XWiki's preferences. workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist=Workspace [{0}] does not exist # PROPERTIES workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiname=Workspace identifier # DOCUMENTATION workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.intro=Create a new workspace. This will create an associated wiki with a wiki descriptor document in the main wiki. Its associated database or schema depends on the database engine being used. It will also add the new workspace's owner to the new wiki's XWiki.XWikiAllGroup. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.wikiname=Choose an identifier name for your workspace. It will be used :\n\ * as the identifier of the workspace's associated wiki;\n\ * as database name in the database engine used as XWiki back-end;\n\ * to target the wiki pages from another wiki with "wikiidentifier:Space.Name" syntax;\n\ * to generate the wiki descriptor page name in the main wiki (~~XWiki.XWikiServer*Wikiindentifier*~~).\n\ Workspace identifier has to contains only lowercase alphanumeric characters (0-9, a-z). workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc=Set all the properties of your workspace here. All theses properties can be changed at any time in the workspace's wiki descriptor page. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.description=A brief workspace description. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.server=The alias used to access the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.server.creation=The alias used to access the workspace. The current alias suffix is ~~{0}~~. To change it edit this wiki page and search the \"$ALIASSUFFIX\" in TOOLS section.
You can add more aliases later in the wiki descriptor page. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on this workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.members=By default a new workspace is independent, meaning that, except for the owner, no user will have access to it. Here you can decide which users and groups will have access to the new workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.summary=You are about to create a new workspace with following options. Please make sure they are correct. To make changes, you can click Previous to reach a previous step.
